backend/main.mo: Defines stable maps for phone and crypto reports and exposes read‑only query methods to fetch report counts.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries detailing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files used for build planning and reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles configuring OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining AntiFraud branding, metadata, manifest link, and root app mount.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming that Phase 3a adds a read‑only canister requiring no frontend code changes.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying AntiFraud name, colors, start URL, and PNG icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring routing, i18n, authentication provider, and page rendering.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL defining the backend canister's analyzeText function.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation, language selector, auth controls, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Authentication UI that handles Internet Identity login and shows a profile menu when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results including risk score, report count, categories, and disclaimers with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Renders quick-action buttons for checking risk, searching the database, reporting, and installing the PWA.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown menu for selecting the app's language, showing current language and switching on click.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Shows a PWA install button or an instruction dialog depending on platform support and installability.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Implements a dialog for submitting fraud reports with validation, rate limiting, and success handling.
Displays user info, search history with clearing options, and a logout button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes and tracks multiple canister actors (main, extra, reports) based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: React hook that detects PWA installability, tracks platform and install state, and exposes a method to trigger installation and show instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages per-identity user history using local storage, allowing adding and clearing recent activity.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language context, persists selected language in sessionStorage, and exposes translation strings.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and the full translation string interface used across the app.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates Dfinity IC actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using a shared agent.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Stores static canister IDs and provides a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for extra canister with phone and crypto report lookup queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for main canister exposing text analysis.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines Candid interface for reports canister including report submission and multi‑type lookup methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme variables and accessibility/touch‑target adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main UI page managing state and actions for phone, crypto, message, and email checks plus collaborative results and reporting.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Renders the institutional mission page with hero, vision, mission, and values sections using i18n text and UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Displays institutional information including core features and accordion-based detailed explanations using translated content.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows a terms and conditions page with multiple i18n-driven sections rendered inside cards.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Implements a minimal router hook tracking the current route and updating history for navigation.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Provides deterministic client-side email risk checks using domain, TLD, typosquat, and pattern heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements localStorage-based rate limiting with a 1‑minute cooldown for submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Scores messages for scam risk using keyword weights, crypto/URL detection, punctuation, and capitalization heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Maps common Portuguese scam-analysis terms to multiple languages using static dictionary lookups.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Provides interfaces for user history and profile and utilities to load, save, and clear user profiles in localStorage keyed by principal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the current AntiFraud project scope, branding rules, backend integration requirements, phased analysis plan, and known issues for development.
